---

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get OPA Access Policy"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/sites/{siteId}/opa/accessPolicy"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns OPA Access Policy, can only be requested with ADMIN privileges

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
